title: Convening of the 55th Workshop Meeting of Heads of National Productivity Organizations (NPOs) of the  countries that Possess Membership of the Asian Productivity Organization
decision_details: - The Asian Productivity Organization that was instituted centralizing Japan, as an International Organization, is facilitating member nations, in promoting the Productivity, in different sectors of Industries as well as agriculture.  19 countries in the Asian and Pacific Zones has procured Membership of this Organization.  The 55th Workshop meeting of Heads of NPOs is to be held in Sri Lanka from 21st to 23rd October 2014. The above information was provided to the Cabinet by Hon. Basheer Segudawood, Minister of Productivity Promotion.
